Introduction

Ju Hak-Nyeon is a South Korean singer and actor under ONE HUNDRED. He participated in the survival show "Produce 101 season 2," where he finished 19th place.

Haknyeon made his official debut on December 6, 2017, as the vocalist, rapper, and lead dancer of the boy group "The Boyz." He also made his acting debut in 2022 through the horror film "Seoul Goedam."
